name: Logic Booster!
description:
Tricky tasks full of surprises and intricate logic are waiting for you in the stock of knowledge of cat scientist. Prove that you can handle them! Get poignant phrases in case of failure or approving praise and glory from the cat scientist himself to the one who is able to solve the tasks! Logic Booster and the cat scientist will surely not let you get bored! Not to mention the tasks getting crazier and crazier towards the end of the game, try not to go crazy!

    Incredible logic tasks and unusual math tasks will take you on an epic journey through the deep aspects of your mind! The game will appeal to both children and adults! You will need extraordinary thinking and going beyond your imagination is necessary to find the right answer! Upgrade your logic with Logic Booster!

What do you think about it?

★ Free to play

★ Almost 200 tasks are available! Their number will only grow!

★ Logic and mathematical tasks! You decide which to solve!

★ The ability to respond as you like! Just write the answer, and special algorithms will try to match your answer with the correct one!

★ More than 400 different phrases from your companion! He will definitely not let you get bored!

★ Who are you? The tasks are distributed in ascending order of difficulty! They are suitable for both children, schoolchildren, teenagers and even adults!

★ You will be surprised how much you can improve your mind and thinking!

★ No Internet? Not a problem! You can still play and complete the levels!            

★ A modern application and game that anyone will definitely like!
